metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010043 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: Quake3e < 5ed740d is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: Possible code execution and denial of service. The component is: Argument string creation.

notes.note: ebarretto> According to Debian: No security impact

criterions.comment: ioquake3 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
